```{r}
library(deSolve)
library(pracma)
parameters <- c(m = 0.445, r = 0.11,
                rho = 1.29, c = 0.5,
                mu = 0.1, g = 9.81)

state_straight <- c(velocity = c(x = 5, y = 28),
                    position = c(x = 0, y = 0))



times <- seq(0, 10, by = 1)


model <- function(t, y, parms){
  with(as.list(c(y, parms)), {
    velocity <- c(x = velocity.x, y = velocity.y)
    pos <- c(x = position.x, y = position.y)
    F_air <- -c * velocity ^ 2
    F_zw <- m * g
    F_tot <- F_air + F_zw
    print(y)
    n_pos <- velocity + pos
    return(list(c(velocity.x, velocity.y,
                n_pos["x"], n_pos["y"])))
  }
  )
} 

out <- as.data.frame(ode(times = times, y = state_straight, parms = parameters, func = model, method = "euler"))

```
